text: Hardwired is a 2009 American Canadian science fiction action movie directed by Ernie Barbarash and starring Val Kilmer, Cuba Gooding Jr., Michael Ironside, Juan Riedinger, Clare Holman, Terry Chen, Rachel Luttrell, Donny Lucas and Ali Liebert. Sony Entertainment distributed it. ==Other websites== * Category:2009 action movies Category:2009 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Canadian action movies Category:Movies about advertising Category:Movies about computing Category:Movies set in British Columbia Category:Movies set in the future Category:Movies directed by Ernie Barbarash
title: Hardwired (movie)
